title: Court: 25-Year-Old Denies Unlawful Killing
content: [Written by Don Burgess]   Rakeem Deshields denied the unlawful killing of Dejon Simmons.   Mr Simmons, a bartender, was injured in fight on Front Street around 3:15 am Sunday, March 18, 2018, and subsequently died from the injuries.   Mr Deshields pled not guilty to the charge.   His next court appearance will be on July 2.   #DonBurgessReports #MagistratesAndSupremeCourt   Category: All, Court Reports, Crime
